verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. In my <S%H6869>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And he answered <S%H6030>me<s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, from <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, And from a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
What shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3254>thee<s%>, and what shall be done more unto <S%H7423>thee<s%>, Thou deceitful <S%H3956>tongue<s%>?
Woe <S%H190><s%> is <S%H1481>me<s%>, that I sojourn in <S%H4902>Meshech<s%>, That I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> among the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>!
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath <S%H7227>long<s%> had her <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> With him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
I am for <S%H7965>peace<s%>: But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, they are for <S%H4421>war<s%>.
